hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Goron Tunic#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Goron Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ToT (Left).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.
